entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pointe-à-la-Croix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -16.0°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
